steps.name: I am logged in with Username and Password into the Pivotal Tracker
I create a new account "New Account" in Pivotal Tracker
I should see the new account page
I should see the new account in the Accounts page

elements.name: Configure the account name of an account created

steps.name: I am logged in with Username and Password into the Pivotal Tracker
I create a new account "New Account" in Pivotal Tracker
I configure the account Name "Change Name" and save the changes
I should see the new account page
I should see the new account in the Accounts page

name: Create, Update and Delete of Account
